item.title: Albany (New York) Travel Guide (Capital District/New York (state)/Mid-Atlantic/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Explore Albany (New York) with this comprehensive travel guide, featuring must-see cultural attractions, stunning natural scenery, hiking and biking routes, activities and tours, food and drink scene, accommodations, souvenir shopping, local culture and customs, safety and health tips, transportation options, nearby destinations, and more.
